content.title: Configuring Update Operation
content.body:
1. From the left menu of the Action Editor, under the Network section, select Loading Indicator.
  2. From the left menu of the Action Editor, under the Network section, select Invoke Service.
  3. From the right pane of the Action Editor, select the following values from the drop-down list
    • Select Service: RecipientStorage$Recipients
    • Select Method: update
  4. Select Open Mapping Editor.
    The mapping editor window appears.
